unnormalised: Decoding the Digital Darshan: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar?
normalised: Decoding the Digital Darshan: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar?

unnormalised: Struggling to understand why your stunning Diwali reel only got 50 likes? Maybe it's time to dive deep into follower analytics! Gone are the days of blindly chasing numbers. Savvy influencers from Mumbai to Madurai are now using tools to analyze who *really* engages with their content.
normalised: Struggling to understand why your stunning Diwali reel only got fifty likes? Maybe it's time to dive deep into follower analytics! Gone are the days of blindly chasing numbers. Savvy influencers from Mumbai to Madurai are now using tools to analyze who really engages with their content.

unnormalised: Think of it as a digital kundali for your online presence. These analytics tools can identify fake accounts, inactive users, and even give you a breakdown of your audience's demographics - age, location (down to the district!), interests…the whole shebang.
normalised: Think of it as a digital kundali for your online presence. These analytics tools can identify fake accounts, inactive users, and even give you a breakdown of your audience's demographics - age, location (down to the district!), interests…the whole shebang.

unnormalised: Imagine knowing that a chunk of your "followers" are actually bots from Bangalore! Pretty shocking, right? Using these insights, you can tailor your content to resonate with your *real* audience, leading to better engagement and more authentic brand partnerships. Experts at IIM Bangalore are even hosting a webinar on this very topic on 26/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs. So ditch the guesswork, embrace the data, and let your follower analytics guide your influencer journey. Remember that amazing ad campaign by D'Mart on 01/01/2023 that went viral? It was all about understanding their customer base deeply. Time to get your own data-driven strategy in place!
